title: Ticket #4873: Update 12 cmd_status_show- rework CondorCmdStatusWorker2.pm
description:
The worker module used by most of these tests was last remaining user of a script to start a "forever" job. We converted to the new SimpleJob with a no_wait mode. Also made it much quieter by adding a verbose arg to CondorTest::GetJobStatus. It is still a little loud but in places other then the 12 tests.

The tests which use the worker modules have to remove the jobs that the worked module started in two personals. We also remove all the personals with the single call to CondorTest::EndTest(); Much cleaned up. We dusted off the cmd_status_shows-help.

This allowed the deletion of 8 files
remarks: In cmd_status_shows-help, I discovered that runCondorTool which is extensibly used will hang under windows and active perl if there is no standard input. The problem is somewhere in the threaded io code. If there is no stdout, it hangs.
check_ins: 2015-Feb-10 11:30   Check-in [43285]: Update CondorCmdStatusWorker2.pm making it cleaner and use job #4873 starting tools now with a no_wait option in Check/SimpleJob.pm. This allowed the removal of all the cmdrunforever files and the removal of the older worker module. Tests were all updated and have to remove these jobs that get set up [...] (By Bill Taylor )
